species.name: probopass
descriptions: Although it can control its units known as Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don’t come back.
It controls three units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force. With them, it can attack the foe from three directions.
It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.
It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.
It is able to emit powerful magnetism, allowing it control over the iron sand that forms its luscious mustache. Using this iron sand, Probopass forms hard stones with which it smites its prey.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: magnet-pull
abilities.effect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
